T04sanss17u:6: varjayaty akṣaṇāny aṣṭau yae ime deśitā mayā /
T04sanss17u:10: sthāmnā balena côpeto nâsau kausīdyam ṛcchati [[DOUBT]] //
T04sanss17u:11: āḍhyo mahādhanaś câsau adhṛṣyaḥ puṇyavān api /
T04sanss17u:14: bhaved dānapatiḥ śūro muktatyāgo hy amatsarī //
T04sanss17u:18: rājye pratiṣṭhito buddhān satkaroti punaḥ punaḥ //
T04sanss17u:19: ścyuta/ câsmād gataḥ svargaṃ prasanno jinaśāsane /
T04sanss17u:21: na śakyaṃ bhāṣatā varṇaṃ kṣapayituṃ kalpakoṭibhiḥ /
T04sanss17u:22: ya stūpaṃ lokanāthasya naraḥ kuryāt pradakṣiṇam //
T04sanss17u:24: na jātu so 'ndhaḥ khañjo vā kalpānām api koṭibhiḥ /
T04sanss17u:25: utpādya bodhicittaṃ yaḥ śāstu stūpaṃ hi vandate //
T04sanss17u:28: yo buddhakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrān kalpān koṭī ca tuliya satkarayā /
T04sanss17u:29: yaś cêha kalpe caramaka ghorakāle vandeya stūpaṃ bahutara tasya puṇyam //
T04sanss17u:31: agro hi buddho 'tuliya dakṣiṇīyo 'grāṃ caritvā cariyaviśeṣa prāptaḥ /
T04sanss17u:32: tasyêha pūjāṃ karia narariṣabhasya vipāka śreṣṭho bhavati atulyarūpaḥ //
T04sanss17u:34: vimānaṃ labhate tatra vicitraṃ ratanām ayam //
T04sanss17u:39: bhuktvā ca tāṃ ratiṃ divyāṃ āyuḥ saṃpūrya paṇḍitaḥ /
T04sanss17u:40: cyutvā ca devalokāt sa manuṣyo bhavati bhogavān //
T04sanss17u:43: satkṛtaḥ syāc ca sarvatra caitye mālāṃ pradāya ca //
T04sanss17u:44: cakravartī ca rājâsau śakraś ca bhavatîśvaraḥ /
T04sanss17u:45: brahmā ca brahmalokasmin caitye mālāṃ pradāya ca //
T04sanss17u:47: sarve 'syârthāḥ samṛdhyanti ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ //
T04sanss17u:48: tyajed dhīnān akuśalān na sa tatrôpapadyate /
T04sanss17u:51: priyaḥ sadayitaś câsau satkṛtaś ca praśaṃsitaḥ /
T04sanss17u:52: davānām atha nāgānāṃ ye lokesmiṃś ca paṇḍitāḥ //
T04sanss17u:54: te kulāḥ satkṛtā bhonti rāṣṭrāṇi nagarāṇi ca //
T04sanss17u:56: yaḥ sarṣapāt sūkṣmataraṃ gṛhītvā dhūpeya dhūpaṃ bhagavati caityakeṣu /
T04sanss17u:57: tasyânuśaṃsān śṛṇuta prabhāṣato me prasannacittā jahiya khilāṃ malāṃś ca //
T04sanss17u:58: sa puṇyavāṃś carati diśaḥ samantād ārogyaprāpto dṛḍhamatir apramattaḥ /
T04sanss17u:59: vineti śokaṃ vicarati cārikāyāṃ priyo manāpo bhavati mahājanasya //
T04sanss17u:60: rājyaṃ ca labdhvā jina varu satkarotī mahânubhāvo vidu cakravartī /
T04sanss17u:61: suvarṇavarṇo vicitralakṣaṇaiḥ sa manojñagandhān labhi sarvaloke //
T04sanss17u:64: yaś cīvareṇa caityeṣu kuryāt pūjām atulāṃ nāyakānāṃ /
T04sanss17u:65: tasyêha bhotī asadṛśu ātmabhāvo dvātriṃśatībhiḥ kavacita lakṣaṇebhiḥ /
T04sanss17u:68: siṃhalatāḥ suruciravarṇasūtrā veṭhitva stūpaṃ bhagavata cīvarebhiḥ //
T04sanss17u:69: datvā patākāṃ bhagavata cetikeṣū chandaṃ janitvā tatha siya buddhaloke /
T04sanss17u:70: sa pūjanīyo bhavati mahājanasya carantu śreṣṭho jinacārikāye //
T04sanss17u:71: suvarṇavarṇo bhavati si ātmabhāvo lābhī sa bhotī suruciracīvarāṇāṃ /
T04sanss17u:73: karpāsikānāṃ susahita kambalānāṃ dukūlakānāṃ tatha varakauśakānāṃ //
T04sanss17u:74: dhvajaṃ daditvā hataraji satvasāre dhanaṃ prabhūtaṃ pratilabhi na cireṇa /
T04sanss17u:75: prabhūtakoṣo bhavati anantaprajño paricāru tasya bhavaty adīnacittaḥ /
T04sanss17u:76: na cittaśūlaṃ janayati so parasya prasādacittaḥ sadâpramattaḥ /
T04sanss17u:77: na tasyâgniḥ kramati viṣannaśastraṃ udvīkṣaṇīyo bhavati mahājanasya //
T04sanss17u:79: adho upādāya ca vibhavâgru yāvat jāmbūnadaṃ tena bhavati buddhakṣetraṃ /
T04sanss17u:80: śakyaṃ kṣayetuṃ āyuśriyâivarūpā na buddhastūpe dharayatâika dīpam //
T04sanss17u:81: na tasya kāyo bhavati avarṇitâṅgo dṛḍhâsu bhotī parighabhujo 'chambhī /
T04sanss17u:82: ālokaprāpto [[DOUBT]] vicarati sarvaloke daditva dīpaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu //
T04sanss17u:83: yadi buddhakṣetrā niyutaśatā sahasrā bhaveyu pūrṇā śikhagatasarṣapebhiḥ /
T04sanss17u:84: śakyaṃ gaṇetuṃ tulayitu bhāṣituṃ vā na tathāgateṣū dharayitu ekadīpam //
T04sanss17u:85: alaṅkaritvā suruciradarśanīyaṃ yo deti chatraṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu /
T04sanss17u:86: tasyêha bhoty asadṛśâtmabhāvo dvātriṃśatībhiḥ kavacita lakṣaṇebhiḥ //
T04sanss17u:87: yebhir jinasya pratapatâtmabhāvo rūpaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ yathariva [[DOUBT]] kāñcanasya /
T04sanss17u:92: na bhogahānir bhavati kadācid asya devāna bhoti gurukṛta pūjitaś ca //
T04sanss17u:94: na kāmabhogau ramati kadāci dhīro viśuddhaśīlaḥ sakuśalabrahmacaryaḥ /
T04sanss17u:96: na jñānahānir bhavati kadācid asya na bodhicittaṃ vijahati so kathañcit /
T04sanss17u:97: maitrīvihārī bhavati adīnacitto datvêha chattraṃ bhagavatacetikeṣu //
T04sanss17u:98: vādyena pūjāṃ naravṛṣabhasya kṛtvā na śoka śalyavaśa jātu bhoti /
T04sanss17u:99: manojñaghoṣo bhavati manuṣyaloke svarâṅgu tasyâvikala viśuddha bhoti //
T04sanss17u:100: viśuddhacakṣur bhavati sa saṃprajanyo viśuddhaśrotro bhavati udagracittaḥ /
T04sanss17u:101: ghraṇêndriyaṃ paramôttapta bhoti vāditva vādyaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu //
T04sanss17u:102: jihvâsya bhoti surucira darśanīyā susūkṣma mṛdvī rucira manojña ghoṣā /
T04sanss17u:103: raktā pravālā yathariva [[DOUBT]] devatānāṃ svarâṅga koṭīvara sṛjate 'prameyāṃ //
T04sanss17u:104: na jātu bhotī uragu ajihvako vā na khañjakubjo nâpi ca nāmitâṅgaḥ /
T04sanss17u:108: na jātu kaścij janaye prasādaṃ devo ca nāgo manuja mahôrago vā /
T04sanss17u:109: āśvāsaprāpto vicarati sarvaloke vāditva vādyaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu //
T04sanss17u:110: kalpāna koṭīniyutaśatā sahasraṃ viśiṣṭakāyo bhavati aninditâṅgaḥ /
T04sanss17u:111: prāsādiko 'sau kavacita lakṣaṇebhiḥ saṃśodhya stūpaṃ bhagavata nirvṛtasya //
T04sanss17u:113: vimānaśreṣṭhaṃ labhati manojñagandhaṃ divyaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ suruciracandanasya /
T04sanss17u:114: na jātu tṛṣṇāṃ janayati so kadācit saṃśodhya stūpaṃ bhagavata nirvṛtasya //
T04sanss17u:115: pralopakāle jinavaraśāsanasmin na jātu bhotī upagata jambudvīpe /
T04sanss17u:116: svarge sa bhoti pratiṣṭhita tasmi kāle gandhânulepaṃ dadiya jinasya stūpe //
T04sanss17u:117: durgandhikāmān aśucijugupsanīyān varjeti nityaṃ pratiṣṭhita śīlaskandhe /
T04sanss17u:118: carī sa nityam imu vara brahmacaryaṃ gandhânulepaṃ kariya jinasya stūpe //
T04sanss17u:119: itaś cyuto 'sau marupati svargaloke 'rthaṃ sahasrā tulayati nô cireṇa /
T04sanss17u:120: karoti cârthaṃ suvipuladevatānāṃ gandhânulepaṃ kariya jinasya stūpe //
T04sanss17u:121: viśiṣṭavākyo bhavati manojñaghoṣaḥ priyo manāpo bahujanasatkṛtaś ca /
T04sanss17u:123: sukhaṃ ca tasya bhavati sadā prasannaṃ gandhânulepaṃ kariya jinasya stūpe //
T04sanss17u:124: apāyabhūmiṃ ... vijahāty aśeṣāṃ āsannako bhavati tathāgatānāṃ /
T04sanss17u:125: prasādalabdhaḥ sada sukhi premaṇīyo gandhânulepaṃ kariya jinasya stūpe //
T04sanss17u:127: so 'kṣaṇaṃ vai vijahāti sarvaṃ aṣṭa kṣaṇāś câsya viśiṣṭa bhonti /
T04sanss17u:128: buddhāna pūjām atuliya so karoti choritva jālaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu //
T04sanss17u:129: śūraś ca bhoti dṛḍhamatir apramatto na kāmabhoge 'bhiratiṃ janeti /
T04sanss17u:130: naiṣkramyaprāptau câdīnacittaḥ choritva jālaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu //
T04sanss17u:131: na bodhicittaṃ pramuṣyati tasya jātu akhaṇḍaśīlo 'sti susaṃvṛtaś ca /
T04sanss17u:132: dharmaṃ virāgaṃ labhate viśuddhaṃ upanīya jālaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu //
T04sanss17u:133: durvācatāṃ vijahati sarvakālaṃ prajñâbhāvaṃ ca jahāty aśeṣam /
T04sanss17u:134: viśālaprajño viharati cārikāyāṃ upanīya jālaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu //
T04sanss17u:135: lābhī ca bhotī śucibhojanānāṃ vastrān viśiṣṭān labhate suvarṇān /
T04sanss17u:143: na tasya rājâpi praduṣṭacittaḥ yo jīrṇapuṣpān apaneya caitye //
T04sanss17u:144: kumārga sarvaṃ pithitâpāyabhūmiḥ sa śīlaskandhe sthita bodhisatvaḥ /
T04sanss17u:145: avatārayitvā jinacetikebhyaḥ puṣpaṃ ca prāg anyanaraiḥ pradattaṃ //
T04sanss17u:146: śokāṃś ca doṣān vijahāty amatto rogān aśeṣān vijahāty anekān /
T04sanss17u:147: āśvāsaprāptaś cânantakalpān yo jīrṇapuṣpān apaneti caitye //
T04sanss17u:149: alaṃkṛto bhavati viśuddhakāyaḥ yo jīrṇapuṣpān apaneti caitye //
T04sanss17u:150: dadyāc ca yaḥ suruciradivya puṣpaṃ māndāravān apy atha pāṭalaṃ vā /
T04sanss17u:151: nirmālyakaṃ yo 'panayeta caitye vipāka śreṣṭho 'sya bhaved atulyaḥ //
T04sanss17u:152: yaḥ prāñjaliḥ praṇamati nāthastūpaṃ chandaṃ janitvā ca sabuddhaloke /
T04sanss17u:153: so bhoti loke gurukṛtu satkṛtaś ca prāsādiko bhavati sudarśanīyaḥ //
T04sanss17u:154: tasyêha rājyaṃ nipatati sarvaloko devâsurā nāgamanuṣyakāś ca /
T04sanss17u:155: sarvāḥ sahasrāḥ kusumita lokadhātuḥ praśāsti rājño vaśêśvarāṃś ca //
T04sanss17u:156: ye tasya rājye sthita bhonti satvāḥ sthāpeya sarvān akaluṣabuddhajñāne /
T04sanss17u:157: apāyabhūmyas tyaktā bhavanti karoti câiṣāṃ paramasuśreṣṭham artham //
T04sanss17u:161: asya bhavati manojñaghoṣaḥ puṇyair upetaḥ smṛtimatipūjanīyaḥ /
T04sanss17u:162: āśvāsaprāpto vicarati jīvaloke sadâbhiprāyaṃ janayati śreṣṭhaprītiṃ //
T04sanss17u:163: paricāra bhoty asya svarâṅga śuddhaḥ jñāyeta satvair madhurapraśāntavākyo /
T04sanss17u:164: na tasya kaścij janayati cêśvaratvaṃ vilokanīyo bhavati mahājanasya /
T04sanss17u:166: ākruṣṭaḥ san nâjanayeta roṣaṃ yaḥ prāñjaliḥ praṇamati buddhastūpaṃ //
T04sanss17u:167: devêndra bhoty upagatasvargaloke manuṣyako bhavati narasya rājā /
T04sanss17u:168: na pārihāṇir bhavati kadācid asya yo 'ñjalībhir namatîha stūpaṃ //
T04sanss17u:169: nâsāv apāye prapateta jātu hīnāṃś ca varjeta sa kāma loke /
T04sanss17u:170: āḍhyo dhanī bhoti prabhūtakoṣo yo 'ñjalībhir namati buddhastūpam //
T04sanss17u:171: sūtrântacaryā na kadācid asya nâsthānakopaṃ kurute nṛloke /
T04sanss17u:172: satvāś ca tṛptā muditâsya bhonti yaḥ saṃpramuñcī guṇavati ekavācaṃ //
T04sanss17u:175: sa puṇyavān bhavati manuṣyaloke rākṣe ca sthitvā jina satkaroti //
T04sanss17u:176: śokā na doṣāḥ khilamala nâsya bhonti atulyatâptaś ca susaṃsthitâṅgaḥ /
T04sanss17u:177: ālokanīyaś ca mahājanasya vrajeta kāmāna bhayakaravairaghorān /
T04sanss17u:179: tiṣṭhatu tāvad ānanda yo māṃ saṃmukhaṃ satkuryāt /
T04sanss17u:180: tiṣṭhatu me śarīrasya pūjā sarṣapaphalama-treṣu dhātuṣu /
T04sanss17u:182: tiṣṭhatu mām uddiśya kṛteṣu stūpeṣu satkāraḥ /
T04sanss17u:183: ye kecid ānanda buddham ālambyântaśâikapuṣpam apy ākāśe kṣepsyanti /
T04sanss17u:184: tasya puṇyaskandhasya yo vipākaḥ saced yāvān anādiḥ saṃsāro yasya pūrvā koṭir na prajñāyate /
T04sanss17u:185: tāvataḥ kalpān saṃsaratāṃ teṣāṃ śakratvaṃ brahmatvaṃ cakravartitvaṃ /
T04sanss17u:188: saced antaśaḥ svapnântaragatâpi satvā buddham ālambyâkāśe ekapuṣpam api kṣepsyanti tad apy ahaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ nirvāṇaparyavasānaṃ vadāmîti //
T04sanss17u:190: aṣṭābhir bhujagâdhipate dharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisatvāḥ satatasamitaṃ buddhasamavadhānaṃ pratilabhante /
T04sanss17u:197: yatra ca buddhakṣetre tathāgataśravaṃ śṛṇvanti tatra praṇidhānam utpādayanti /
T04sanss17u:209: mahat puṇyam ayaṃ kṣetraṃ muditaṃ jñānamaṇḍalaṃ /
T04sanss17u:212: na durgatibhayaṃ teṣāṃ yair ihârāgito jinaḥ //
T04sanss17u:223: varaṃ tatra ciraṃ vāso buddhānām aśrutir na ca //
T04sanss17u:224: kiṃ kāraṇam apāyeṣu nivāsaś ciram iṣyate /
T04sanss17u:229: kṣapayaty āvṛtīḥ sarvā dṛṣṭvā buddhaṃ narôttamam /
T04sanss17u:230: vardhayaty amitaṃ puṇyaṃ yena bodhir avāpyatae /
T04sanss17u:233: tad evam asti puṇyavṛddhau buddhasamavadhānena prayojanaṃ /
T04sanss17u:234: api ca pratimāmātradarśanam api tāvad aparimitaphalaṃ tathāgatānāṃ /
T04sanss17u:237: yaḥ kaścin mañjuśrīḥ kulaputraḥ kuladuhitā vā sarvalokadhāturajôpamānāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ dine dine śatarasam āhāraṃ dadyāt divyāni ca vastrāṇi
T04sanss17u:239: yaś cânyo mañjuśrīḥ kulaputraḥ kuladuhitā vā citrakarmalikhitaṃ vā pustakakarmakṛtaṃ vā buddhaṃ paśyed /
T04sanss17u:241: kaḥ punar vādo yo 'ñjalipragrahaṃ vā kuryāt puṣpaṃ vā dadyāt dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā dīpaṃ vā dadyād /
T04sanss17u:244: yas tathāgatacaityaṃ śodhayati sa catasro 'grāḥ praṇidhānaviśuddhīr anuprāpnoti /
T04sanss17u:260: na śrutavikalo na prajñāvikalo na praṇidhānavikalêti //
T04sanss17u:262: ye tribhavaparyāpannāḥ satvās te sarve pratyekaṃ tathāgatastūpān kārayeyur evaṃrūpān uccaistvena /
T04sanss17u:264: tāṃś ca gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān kalpān pratyekaṃ sarvasatkāraiḥ satkuryuḥ /
T04sanss17u:266: ayaṃ tasmāt pūrvakāt puṇyaskandhād bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet //atrâivôktaṃ /
T04sanss17u:267: ye khalu punas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau satvās te sarve mahāyānasaṃprasthitā bhaveyuḥ /
T04sanss17u:268: sarve ca cakravartirājyasamanvāgatā bhaveyur ekâikaś ca rājā cakravartī mahāsamudrapramāṇadīpasthālīṃ kṛtvā /
T04sanss17u:269: sumerumātrāṃ vartīm ādīpya pratyekam evaṃrūpāṃ dīpapūjāṃ tathāgatacaityeṣu pravartayet /
T04sanss17u:270: yaś câbhiniṣkrāntagṛhâvāso bodhisatvas tailaprakṣiptāṃ vartīṃ kṛtvâdīpya tathāgatacaitye dhārayet /
T04sanss17u:271: asyās tailaprakṣiptāyā varter etat pūrvakaṃ pradīpadānaṃ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nôpaiti /
T04sanss17u:272: yāvad upaniṣadam api na kṣamatae iti /
T04sanss17u:274: ye ca khalu punas te rājānaś cakravartino buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃ-
T04sanss17u:276: ghaṃ sarvasukhôpadhānaiḥ satkuryuḥ yaś câbhiniṣkrāntagṛhâvāso bodhisatvaḥ piṇḍapātraṃ caritvā pātraparyāpannaṃ pareṣāṃ saṃvibhajya paribhuñjīta
T04sanss17u:277: idaṃ tato bahutaraṃ ca mahârghataraṃ ca /
T04sanss17u:278: yac ca te rājānaś cakravartinaḥ sumerumātraṃ cīvararāśiṃ buddhapramukhāya bhikṣusaṃghāya dadyuḥ /
T04sanss17u:279: yac câbhiniṣkrāntagṛhâvāso bodhisatvas tricīvaraṃ bahirdhā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāya buddhapramukhāya bhikṣusaṃghāya vā tathāgatacaitye vā dadyād
T04sanss17u:280: idaṃ bhikṣoś cīvaradānam etat pūrvakacīvararāśim abhibhavati /
T04sanss17u:281: yac ca te rājānaḥ pratyekaṃ sarvaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ puṣpasaṃstṛtaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatacaitye niryātayet /
T04sanss17u:282: yac câbhiniṣkrāntagṛhâvāso bodhisatvaḥ antaśâikapuṣpam api tathāgatacaitye āropayet /
T04sanss17u:283: asya dānasyâitat pūrvakaṃ dānaṃ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nôpaiti /
T04sanss17u:287: caturêmān bhadrânuśaṃsān paśyan bodhisatvas tathāgatapūjāyām utsuko bhavati /
T04sanss17u:289: agraś ca me dakṣiṇīyaḥ pūjito bhaviṣyati
T04sanss17u:292: tathāgataṃ ca pūjayitvā bodhicittaṃ dṛḍhaṃ bhaviṣyati /
T04sanss17u:293: dvātriṃśatāṃ ca mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇānāṃ saṃmukhadarśanena kuśalamūlam upacitaṃ bhaviṣyati /
T04sanss17u:303: daśabhiḥ kulaputra dharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisatvânanuliptā garbhamalena jāyante /
T04sanss17u:313: tac ca nirāmiṣeṇa cittena na sâmiṣeṇa /
T04sanss17u:316: anena kuśalamūlena sarvasatvā nirupaliptā garbhamalena jāyantām iti /
T04sanss17u:320: yaḥ prathamayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ tāṃś cittôtpādān anumodate /
T04sanss17u:321: caratām api bodhisatvacaryāṃ tāṃś cittôtpādān anumodate /
T04sanss17u:322: avinivartanīyām api avinivartanīyadharmatām anumodate bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ /
T04sanss17u:324: kiyantaṃ sa bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati //
T04sanss17u:325: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat / pe /
T04sanss17u:326: syāt khalu punaḥ kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasrasya lokadhātoḥ palâgreṇa tulyamānasasya pramāṇam udgrahītuṃ /
T04sanss17u:327: na tv eva kauśika bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya teṣām anumodanāsahagatānāṃ cittôtpādānāṃ puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītuṃ //
T04sanss17u:328: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat /
T04sanss17u:330: ye bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prathamacittôtpādam upādāya yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃ-
T04sanss17u:332: bodhim abhisaṃbuddhānām evam aprameyam anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyam iti na śṛṇvanti na jānanti /
T04sanss17u:336: yaiḥ kauśika kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś cême cittôtpādânumoditā bodhisatvayānikair vā pratyekabuddhayānikair vā śrāvakayānikair vā /
T04sanss17u:337: te kṣipraṃ tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān ārāgayiṣyanti //
T04sanss17u:339: evaṃ tair anumodanāsahagataiś cittôtpādakuśalamūlair yatra yatrôpapatsyante tatra
T04sanss17u:340: tatra satkṛtāś ca bhaviṣyanti gurukṛtāś ca mānitāś ca pūjitāś cârcitāś câpacāyitāś ca bhaviṣyanti /
T04sanss17u:343: evaṃ na gandhān na rasān na spraṣṭavyān sprakṣyanti na ca teṣām apāyeṣûpapattiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā svargôpapattis teṣāṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyā /
T04sanss17u:345: tathā hi taiḥ satvaiḥ sarvasatvasukhâvahanāni asaṃkhyeyānāṃ satvānāṃ kuśalamūlāny
T04sanss17u:346: anumoditāni yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhyâprameyâsaṃkhyeyān satvān
T04sanss17u:351: dīvālikôpameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasatvās te sarve 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ pratitiṣṭheyur anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prati-
T04sanss17u:353: ṣṭhāya gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān kalpān upalambhasaṃjñinaś catvāri dhyānāni samāpadyeran /
T04sanss17u:354: yaś ca bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'nayā prajñāpāramitayôpāyakauśalyena ca parigṛhītâtītânāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaṃ
T04sanss17u:356: sarvam ekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣam anumodetâgrayânumodanayā
T04sanss17u:359: asya subhūte 'numodanāsahagatasya puṇyakriyāvastuno 'sau pūrvakâupalambhikānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ caturdhyānamayaḥ puṇyâbhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nôpaiti yāvad upaniṣada-
T04sanss17u:362: athavâgrapariṇāmanayā pariṇāmitatvāt sarvapuṇyānām asya buddhatvāya satkṛtapraṇidhibuddhatvam eva syāt /
T04sanss17u:365: adhyeṣaṇāyās tv anuśaṃsâryôgraparipṛcchāyām uktā dharmagrāhyatām upādāyâprameyâsaṃkhyeyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣv āyuḥ parirakṣaṇāyêti //
